---
title: "improve_docs_v1.yaml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines an issue template for improving documentation in a GitHub repository. It provides a structured format for users to submit requests for documentation improvements, including fields for description, visual aids, and additional context.

## Symbols

### Issue Template
#### Description
This YAML file defines an issue template named "✍️ Improve our docs" for documentation improvement requests. It includes a title prefix, description, and labels, along with several input fields for users to provide detailed information about their documentation improvement suggestions.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| name | string | The name of the issue template |
| title | string | The default title prefix for issues created with this template |
| description | string | A brief description of the template's purpose |
| labels | array | Labels to be automatically applied to issues created with this template |
| body | array | An array of input fields that make up the issue template |

#### Internal Logic
The template is structured with the following components:
1. A markdown section with a welcome message
2. A required textarea for a short description of the proposed improvement
3. An optional textarea for video or screenshot links
4. An optional textarea for additional information or context

Each input field is defined with attributes such as label, description, and validation requirements.

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| GitHub Actions | This template is designed to work with GitHub's issue creation system |

### Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| name | string | "✍️ Improve our docs" | The name of the issue template |
| title | string | "[Docs]: " | The prefix for the issue title |
| labels | array | ["documentation"] | Labels automatically applied to the issue |

## API/Interface Reference
| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|:------|:-----|:---------|:------------|
| Short description | textarea | Yes | Brief explanation of the proposed documentation improvement |
| Video or screenshots | textarea | No | Links to visual aids supporting the request |
| Anything else? | textarea | No | Additional context or information about the request |

This issue template provides a structured way for users to submit documentation improvement requests, ensuring that maintainers receive consistent and comprehensive information to address documentation needs effectively.
